title: Knowledge Application Workshop for Integrated Architectural Project Design

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental architectural design principles and project management experience
context.additional_context: Targeting participants in corporate architecture-related language education programs. Emphasis on hands-on practice with digital tools and collaborative learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real-world architectural project scenarios to derive core design elements.
Learners can write a report explaining the linkage between theory and practice through problem-based learning (PBL).
Learners can collaborate with team members in project-based learning (PjBL) to develop an architectural design prototype and complete presentation materials.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
